body: Effects that grant natural armor work even better for you.
name: Tough as Iron
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Duergar/New Rules/Duergar Feats/Tough as Iron

sections.body: When you gain an enhancement bonus to your natural armor, that bonus increases by 2. This has no effect if your natural armor bonus is +0 or you do not have an enhancement bonus increasing your natural armor bonus.
sections.name: Benefit
